content: व्यूहः {@--1@} A military array; <ls>Ms. 7. 187.</ls> {@--2@} An army, a host, squadron; व्यूहावुभौ तावितरेतरस्मात् भंगं जयं चापतुरव्यवस्थं <ls>R. 7. 54.</ls> {@--3@} A large quantity, an assemblage, a multitude, collection. {@--4@} A part, portion, subhead. {@--5@} The body. {@--6@} Structure, formation. {@--7@} Reasoning, logic. {@--8@} Separation, distribution. {@--9@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) A peculiar arrangement of the senses.
